title: The Me Who Wants To Escape The Princess Training - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Broken Engagement   Confinement   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Engagement   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Hot-blooded Protagonist   Lack of Common Sense   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Yandere   Misunderstandings   Nobles   Otome Game   Possessive Characters   Royalty   Stockholm Syndrome   Villainess Noble Girls
author: Sawano Izumi   沢野いずみ
description:
The prince, who had a fiancee, was waiting upon a lady that wasn’t me.

Then that means, he’s breaking it off?

“Finally–!”

With this, I’m delighted that I can finally escape from that strict princess training. As I gave the both of them my thanks, I went back to the countryside.

But for some reason, the prince ran after me. He won’t break it off? Why!?

A highly exciting love comedy of a prince who chases after a lady that runs away.>
